overview: The story 1st involves a mother and daughter who were diagnosed with cancer six months apart (their journey) After death of the mother who waited too late to get help, the daughter dedicates her life to helping those who will and won't survive. This story will highlight six case histories and show the world that cancer has no boundaries as to age, gender, race, nationality, or financial status. By: Norman Ray Fitts
title: Joy Comes in the Morning
